snippet: Under an army watchtower and across the street from the concrete wall Israel has built in parts of the occupied West Bank, street artist Banksy has opened a guesthouse in the Palestinian city of Bethlehem....

headline.main: Montenegro Pro-Russian Leaders Seek Bannon Help Against NATO
headline.print_headline: Montenegro Pro-Russian Leaders Seek Bannon Help Against NATO

lead_paragraph: Under an army watchtower and across the street from the concrete wall Israel has built in parts of the occupied West Bank, street artist Banksy has opened a guesthouse in the Palestinian city of Bethlehem.
